LanguageData.AS_WHE_Helmet.label: Helmet (half-elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Helmet.description: A helmet that protects the top of the head made of metal. Simple yet durable.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_AdvancedHelmet.label: Half Elf Advanced Helmet
LanguageData.AS_WHE_AdvancedHelmet.description: A metal upper-head helmet made with more advanced half-elf technology. The screen on the front also protects your eyes.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_MarineHelmet.label: Half Elven Marine Helmet
LanguageData.AS_WHE_MarineHelmet.description: A marine helmet made with half-elf technology. Both strength and lightness are put together at a high level, making it easy for half-elves with long ears to put on and take off.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_MaidHairBand.label: Maid Headband (Half Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_MaidHairBand.description: A headband worn by maids. If you wear it with a maid outfit, you will become a perfect and elegant maid.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Horn.label: Horn (Half Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Horn.description: A horn attached to the head. It doesn't do anything special, but it does make it look a little cooler. Cool and cute! It is easy to put on and take off.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_PressureResistantHelmet.label: Half Elf Pressure Resistant Helmet
LanguageData.AS_WHE_PressureResistantHelmet.descripti: A helmet crafted with advanced technology to allow you to operate in outer space. It's slightly weaker than Marine equipment, but has high heat and cold resistance.
